verses.t: I will praise{H3034} thee with my whole heart{H3820}: before the gods{H430} will I sing praise{H2167} unto thee.

I will worship{H7812} toward thy holy{H6944} temple{H1964}, and praise{H3034} thy name{H8034} for thy lovingkindness{H2617} and for thy truth{H571}: for thou hast magnified{H1431} thy word{H565} above all thy name{H8034}.
In the day{H3117} when I cried{H7121} thou answeredst{H6030} me, and strengthenedst{H7292} me with strength{H5797} in my soul{H5315}.
All the kings{H4428} of the earth{H776} shall praise{H3034} Lordthee, O {H3068}, when they hear{H8085} the words{H561} of thy mouth{H6310}.
Yea, they shall sing{H7891} in the ways{H1870} Lordof the {H3068}: for great{H1419} is the glory{H3519} Lordof the {H3068}.
LordThough the {H3068} be high{H7311}, yet hath he respect{H7200} unto the lowly{H8217}: but the proud{H1364} he knoweth{H3045} afar off{H4801}.

Though I walk{H3212} in the midst{H7130} of trouble{H6869}, thou wilt revive{H2421} me: thou shalt stretch forth{H7971} thine hand{H3027} against the wrath{H639} of mine enemies{H341}, and thy right hand{H3225} shall save{H3467} me.
LordThe {H3068} will perfect{H1584} that which concerneth me: thy mercy{H2617}, LordO {H3068}, endureth for ever{H5769}: forsake{H7503} not the works{H4639} of thine own hands{H3027}.
